Elect Thrasher there she goes with the strange hair, with the cow face girl (this is why i dont like her, cow face with a cow mind) dirty man licking lips, watch the young try to be the old why can't i do 21498715610235 x 12341487921374 ?? why? why? im dumb. thought the second grader. dirty thoughts in a tired boy's head make good bedtime stories nod and yawn, shut ears, nod and yawn clumps on eyelashes, she lost her key, again, all i see is her eyelashes, dont wannna see the rest, the rest is with the key, again. everyone wants to be him, thats why he makes me feel nervous
